name: Hoppy RPG
description:
Hoppy is back!

This time the evil edge-lord wizard Co-lorn is causing trouble with endra's most precious power source: The Aether crystal, it's up to Hoppy and her friends to defeat Co-lorn and his bratty wiafu squad.

I would like to thank:

Eric skiff for his amazing chiptune music

Sturfall for the amazing music provided

Hypeyna for his music

and all credit goes to corresponding music creators and their ilk as this game is a free game so i will not be charging money.

I would also like to thank Amalgash for volunteering to be a character in my game (I'll add you in the open beta, doncha worry)

I would like to thank Sana and the Smile game builder discord and The Jinmaze discord crew for helping me with this game!
